mapper.select: select sp.id, sp.parent_id, sp.type, sp.name, sp.title, sp.icon, sp.code, sp.path, sp.component, sp.external_link, sp.order_no, sp.show_in_menu, sp.open_mode from sys_permission sp left join sys_role_permission srp on srp.permission_id = sp.id where srp.role_id = #{roleId} and sp.status = #{status} order by sp.order_no
